name: Zombie Znake
description:
You are playing as a zombie in a town. Multiple people roam around and it is your goal to infest all humans. Infest as many humans as you can, but don't make your own zombies attack each other!

Move using WASD.

Credits:

Programming

  • Boas-Bas V.
  • Oscar Vilhelmsson

Art

  • Bart van Twillert
  • Kimberly Ge
  • Susanne V.

This is a game made during the International Educations Game Jam 2021.
